##Chapter 4, Example 4.7

###Install packages
```{r, echo = TRUE}
install.packages("stats")
```
###General
```{r, echo = TRUE}
setwd("C:/Users/Daniela/Desktop/Projects2023/Book/FInalDraft/Codes_and_Data/Chapter4")
data <-read.csv(file="Ex4.7.csv",head=TRUE,sep=",")
data=data[c(1:14),c(1:2)];
data
```

###Model
```{r, echo = TRUE}
library(stats)
model <- nls(data$Capacity~ k*(data$N^p),
                 data = data,
                 start = list(k=4, p = -0.1),)
summary(model)
```
